item.title: CMake Update
item.description: Update Hebasto has a branch he has been PRing into his own repo. Opened a huge CMake PR for Bitcoin core. Introducing it chunk by chunk on his own repo QT and GUIX is after that Next steps How to get this into Core? We don’t have something clean. Still have something wonky and how and what to do with autotools. Ideally introduce CMake for a full cycle. It might still be a little too rough to ship on day 1 of the v27 cycle.
